description: In a plush cotton blend, this hoodie features the American flag, as well as our logo and signature embroidered Pony.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.5" body length (front and back), a 19" shoulder, a 45.5" chest, and a 35" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Drawstring hood with a ribbed V-inset.
American flag and "Polo Ralph Lauren" script printed at the center front. Kangaroo pocket.
Signature embroidered Pony above the left cuff.
Shell: cotton, polyester. V-inset, cuffs, and hem: cotton, elastane.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
